title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 331.5 - Terms
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 331.5 - Terms

State Regulations

The university representatives shall serve at the
pleasure of the chancellor of the university. Each representative of a

State-operated unit or contract college shall serve for a term of three years; provided, however, that no such representative shall serve as a member of the
senate after termination of employment in the unit from which the
representative was elected. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
331.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
